description.short: Automatically record and transcribe Teams meetings
description.full: Teams Meeting Fetcher helps your organization automatically record and transcribe Teams meetings. When meeting organizers enable recording, the system automatically fetches the transcriptions for easy reference, compliance, and archival.

shortDescription: Record and transcribe Teams meetings automatically
longDescription: Teams Meeting Fetcher is designed for organizations that need to record and transcribe Teams meetings for compliance, documentation, or knowledge management. When a meeting organizer enables recording, the system automatically fetches the transcription once it's available, making it easy to search, reference, and archive meeting content.
